憴字的基本解释

憴
shéng
〔憴憴〕戒备警惕；谨慎。

憴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shéng］
［《廣韻》食陵切，平蒸，船。］
见“憴憴”。

憴字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憴； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页404第31
【廣韻】食陵切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】神陵切，?音繩。【爾雅·釋訓】憴憴，戒也。又通作繩。【詩·周南】宜爾子孫繩繩兮。【註】戒愼也。

憴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
憴字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Faint
shéng
〔膴憴〕Be vigilant; be cautious.
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shéng］
["Guangyun" Shiling cut, flat steamed, boat. ]
See "faint".
Faint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憴; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 404 31
[Guang Yun] Shi Ling Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Shen Ling Cut,? Sound rope. 【Erya·Shixun】faint, give up. Also pass as a rope. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】The descendants of Yier go to the ropes. [Note] Quit stunned.
